edu.columbia.cs.sdarts.backend.doc
Class DocConstants

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--edu.columbia.cs.sdarts.backend.doc.DocConstants
public class DocConstants
extends java.lang.Object

A "constants container" for various constants related to text document parsing. These are all filenames; the sdarts.backend.doc package dictates that all indexes, meta-attributes, and content-summaries be saved with constant filenames. Also, the configuration for a BackEndLSP using the text package must be called text_config.xml.

Field Summary
static java.lang.String CONFIG_FILENAME
          The configuration is always saved as "doc_config.xml"
static java.lang.String CONTENT_SUMMARY_FILENAME
          The content-summary is always saved as "content_summary.xml"
static java.lang.String INDEX_FILENAME
          The index is always saved as "index"
static java.lang.String META_ATTRIBUTES_FILENAME
          The meta-attributes are always saved as "meta_attributes.xml"
static java.lang.String STYLESHEET_FILENAME
          The stylesheet is always saved as "doc_style.xsl"
